org.treetank.io

Class IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.io.IOUtils

  • public class IOUtils
extends Object
    Public class for having utility methods related to the storage in one class.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Method Detail

      • createFolderStructure

        public static boolean createFolderStructure(File pFile,
                            IConfigurationPath[] pPaths)
                                     throws TTIOException
        Creating a folder structure based on a set of paths given as parameter and returning a boolean determining the success.
        Parameters:
        pFile - the root folder where the configuration should be created to.
        pPaths - to be created
        Returns:
        true if creations was successful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        TTIOException

      • compareStructure

        public static int compareStructure(File pFile,
                   IConfigurationPath[] pPaths)
        Checking a structure in a folder to be equal with the data in this enum.
        Parameters:
        pFile - to be checked
        pPaths - containing the elements to be checked against
        Returns:
        -1 if less folders are there, 0 if the structure is equal to the one expected, 1 if the structure has more folders

      • recursiveDelete

        public static boolean recursiveDelete(File pFile)
        Deleting a storage recursive. Used for deleting a databases
        Parameters:
        pFile - which should be deleted included descendants
        Returns:
        true if delete is valid
